explains: adj. 放射性的，有辐射的
wordGroup: radioactive waste 放射性废弃物
radioactive isotope 放射性同位素
radioactive material 放射性物质；放射性材料
radioactive fallout 放射性尘降物
radioactive tracer 放射性示踪剂，放射性指示剂
radioactive waste management 放射性废物管理

sentences.en: Radioactive water had seeped into underground reservoirs.
sentences.cn: 放射性水已渗入了地下蓄水池。

sentences.en: The waste is safely locked away until it is no longer radioactive.
sentences.cn: 废料被安全地封存，直到其不再有辐射。

sentences.en: They were exposed to radioactive fallout during nuclear weapons tests.
sentences.cn: 他们在核武器试验过程中暴露于放射性核辐射。
